messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] rock tumbler
messages.msgSnippet: I wonder how long it would take to have any effect. We have a tumbler actually, and it takes a total run of about 5 weeks- a lot of rainy days! It is a neat
messages.messageBody:
"I wonder how long it would take to have any effect."

We have a tumbler actually, and it takes a total run of about 5 weeks- a lot of rainy days! It is a neat thing, but we have to buy more of the powder stuff for it. I have thought about using sand from our sandbox:) Maybe I will to see what happens.Get more from the Web. FREE MSN Explorer download : http://explorer.msn.com
